member.summary: Provides a graph-link to the object to be serialized.

member.summary: Specifies the serialization formatting type to be used.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the BaseSerializable class, using the specified serialization formatter.
member.param: Serialization formatter to use.

member.summary: Serializes the object to a string.
member.returns: A string representing the serialized form of the object.

member.summary: Serializes the object to a file.
member.param: Path to the file to serialize to. The file will be overwritten.

member.summary: Deserializes the given string data into an object.

Serialization formatter to use for deserializing.
member.returns: The deserialized object from the string.

member.summary: Deserializes the given string data into an object.

member.returns: The deserialized object from the string.

member.summary: Deserializes the given memory stream into an object.
member.param: Memory stream containing the serialized data to deserialize.
Serialization formatter to use for deserializing.
member.returns: The deserialized object from the stream.

member.summary: Deserializes the given file into an object.
member.param: Path to the file containing the serialized data to deserialize.
Serialization formatter to use for deserializing.
member.returns: The deserialized object from the file.

member.name: M:DaedalusLib.BaseSerializable._Deserialize(System.String)
member.summary: Deserializes the given file into an object.
member.param: Path to the file containing the serialized data to deserialize.
member.returns: The deserialized object from the file.

member.name: T:DaedalusLib.BaseSerializable.FormatterType
member.summary: Provides enumeration for different serialization formatting types.

member.name: F:DaedalusLib.BaseSerializable.FormatterType.Binary
member.summary: Use binary serialization. This is not very verbose, and is not intended for transmitting data between programs.

member.name: F:DaedalusLib.BaseSerializable.FormatterType.Soap
member.summary: Use SOAP serialization. This is verbose, and is suitable for transmission between programs. Plain text is used.

member.summary: Provides an interface to the BaseSerializable class using a fixed type.
member.typeparam: Type of object to interface with.

Serialization formatter to use for deserializing.
member.returns: The deserialized object from the stream.

member.name: M:DaedalusLib.EBaseSerializable.CryptDecrypt(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Encrypts or decrypts the given text using the specified key. Pass text in once to encrypt, pass the encrypted text in to decrypt. You must use the same key both times.
member.param: Data to encrypt or decrypt.
Encryption key to use.

member.summary: Initializes the encrypted container class.

member.summary: Loads the class from an encrypted file.
member.param: File to read from.
Encryption key used to decrypt data. Must be the same as original encryption key.
member.returns: A new EContainer object containing all the previously serialized data.

member.summary: Retreives or sets a key value.
